title: Browns, World Series, Packers, & where Colin was right and wrong
itunes:title: Browns, World Series, Packers, & where Colin was right and wrong
description:
Colin discusses the turmoil going on to the Cleveland Browns, why the Boston Red Sox won the World Series, why Los Angeles Dodgers manager Dave Roberts shouldn't be fired, the end of the Green Bay Packers-Los Angeles Rams game, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Nick Swisher, Trent Dilfer, and Greg Jennings.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
